snippet: Australia's three World Cup-winning captains are unified in their belief that under-fire skipper Michael Clarke is the right man to lead the team to a potential fifth tournament victory next March....

headline.print_headline: Clarke Backed by Predecessors as World Cup Nears
headline.main: Clarke Backed by Predecessors as World Cup Nears

lead_paragraph: Australia's three World Cup-winning captains are unified in their belief that under-fire skipper Michael Clarke is the right man to lead the team to a potential fifth tournament victory next March.
